topic.title: content path
topic.body:
Is there a way to change the path were all the content is being stored?
I don't want it on my small root partition.

1_13AvYD3hX888Ey6y8kFEce3Ak8hVNLcdrg.body:
Ok, will use a link then. I thought there would be an option to set the path in a config or as a prefix.
Thanks

> [nofish](#comment_443_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): you can also set it using --data_dir /somewhere/another/place or zeronet.conf:
> [global]
> data_dir = /somewhere/another/place

that's what I was looking for, thanks a lot
